patthana14.21:1.1: Sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.21:2.1: Anārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.21:3.1: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana14.21:4.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
